titleStmt.title: A collection of some brave actions and memorable sayings of King Henry the Great. Writ in French by the Bishop of Rodez, as a supplement to the history of that King, formerly publish'd by the same author. Done into English. Licensed, June 6. 1688
titleStmt.author: Péréfixe de Beaumont, Hardouin de, b. 1605.

titleStmt.title: A collection of some brave actions and memorable sayings of King Henry the Great. Writ in French by the Bishop of Rodez, as a supplement to the history of that King, formerly publish'd by the same author. Done into English. Licensed, June 6. 1688
titleStmt.author: Péréfixe de Beaumont, Hardouin de, b. 1605.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Abel Roper at the Bell over against the Middle Temple-Gate, near Temple-Bar,

notesStmt.note: Bishop of Rodez = Hardouin de Beaumont de Péréfixe.
Caption title on pg. 1: A collection of certain brave actions and memorable sayings of King Henry the Great.
Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
